[utils](./README.md) > [Subject](./Subject.md)

## Subject class

Observable implementation that allows multiple observers to watch values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Subject<T>
```

## Methods

| Method                              | Description                                   |
| ----------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| [next](./Subject.next.md)           | Sends a value to all Subject observers.<br /> |
| [subscribe](./Subject.subscribe.md) | Subscribes to subject updates.<br />          |
